questiontext.text: Write a C# program that echoes standard input to standard output.

stdin.text: I'm a line of standard input So am I

expected.text: I'm a line of standard input So am I

stdin.text:
JUST the place for a Snark!" the Bellman cried, As he landed his crew with care; Supporting each man on the top of the tide By a finger entwined in his hair.
"Just the place for a Snark! I have said it twice: That alone should encourage the crew. Just the place for a Snark! I have said it thrice: What I tell you three times is true."

expected.text:
JUST the place for a Snark!" the Bellman cried, As he landed his crew with care; Supporting each man on the top of the tide By a finger entwined in his hair.
"Just the place for a Snark! I have said it twice: That alone should encourage the crew. Just the place for a Snark! I have said it thrice: What I tell you three times is true."

questiontext.text: A prototype for a C# (mono) question type that tests a C# "write-a-program" question. It attempts to run all tests in a single Jobe run with a single compilation. If the run fails for any reason, including compilation error, run-time error or timeout, the CodeRunner framework will re-run this template once for each test case until the failing test case is met.
